summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests that verify Cython's signature matching algorithm, particularly its handling of overloaded C/C++ function signatures involving reference types and different parameter counts, using helper utilities to construct function and class types.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of Cython's overload resolution logic for C/C++ interop, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable code generation when dealing with complex function signatures.
